website_summaries.verdict: This police-style jacket is the perfect choice for those who appreciate bold and durable motorcycle apparel.
pros: Top-notch jacket from a proven provider of motorcycle apparel
Two lower zippered pockets with an extra ticket book snap close storage pocket provide ample storage space
Built-in waist belt/buckle ensures you can wear the jacket comfortably at all times
Available in a variety of sizes
cons: Shoulders are too high for some riders
Jacket material sometimes emits a strange and unpleasant odor

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and style, runs big, liner is fragile.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is perfect, definitely fit large, I'm 5'10 168 lbs muscular build wearing size xs. The leather is good quality, have a good weight to it, the lining is very fragile, I already have many places ripped, I will soon get my lining replaced at an alteration place. The leather wears beautifully overtime, I've had this jacket for a year and I know it's gonna look 10x better couple decades later.
customer_reviews.author: Remy

customer_reviews.title: No regrets whatsoever!
customer_reviews.text: For the price I paid for this, I was positive this was going to be one of those "too good to be true" purchases I would regret... I didn't think it could possibly live up to my husbands "biker" standards and I was sure I would be returning it after Christmas. Turns out I couldn't have been more wrong. I'm still rather in disbelief. He is VERY happy with it!! I feel like I got away with a steal and I still half expect to get a notice that a pricing mistake was made. This is an excellent, well made, great looking jacket!
customer_reviews.author: GmaDebi

customer_reviews.title: exactly what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: went with the medium but returned it and got the small. i wanted a snug fit and the small is perfect. i'm 6' 170lbs and the small fits tight like i wanted with the liner in, so i could layer a hoodie without the liner. the medium was just a little too baggy and would be great if i was a dad rolling on a harley. the reviews were dead on for this jacket. feels very high quality and is heavy as sh_t. contrary to what someone said in the questions there ARE 2 inside pockets with snaps. this jacket is metal as f_ck.
customer_reviews.author: huh?

customer_reviews.title: The sizing chart is pure science fiction
customer_reviews.text: Going by the sizing chart provided, I determined that I was a 4X. I'm a big guy, 6'3" tall with a 56" chest. What I got was something that my 5'3" girlfriend could wear, roughly a large or XL. Ridiculous. It's a real shame too, since the jacket seemed to be really well made with thick leather, and a nice thick removable liner inside. Lots of pockets, too. The crazy thing is that when I was looking at a replacement in a larger size, I saw a sizing chart that went up to 12X! Perhaps I would try that, but they apparently don't sell larger than 5X on Amazon. Too bad, returning.
customer_reviews.author: C. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: This is a great jacket at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes you get what you pay for, sometimes, rarely, you get one heck of a deal... this is one of those instances. I am blown away that you can get this jacket - this leather is high quality and this jacket is thick and seriously well-made - for a hundred and twenty bucks. If I'd seen the jacket without knowing the price I'd have guessed it was easily 250 bucks. This is a great price for an excellent jacket. By the way, they run a little small - if you are over 5'8'' don't even consider anything but the large. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: ratboydc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent jacket, excellent price
customer_reviews.text: You couldn't buy a better quality jacket anywhere. Excellent leather, A-1 construction. Easily removable liner. Sizing was perfect for me. Go ahead and spend 6 to 8 hundred for a name label. But a functional, quality jacket, you can't go wrong with this one. I don't know why some people have trouble with the sizing. I'm 5'10" tall and 215 pounds. Slight belly. XL fit me perfect after adjusting the side laces. The leather is pebble-grain finish that will be great after breaking in. I am extremely happy with this jacket and plan to buy a set of chaps from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Just Like Classic Motorcycle Cops Used to Wear
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is made very well. I wearing riding in the winter on my Harley and it works perfectly. This jacket is more effective than motorcycle jackets I have paid twice as much for. There is no spine protection; when I say "classic motorcycle cops" I mean exactly that - it has thicker leather to resist road-rash. It has very sturdy zippers and there are ties on the side to slim it up or let it out a bit to really get the customized look you're looking for. A jacket like this is easily worth three or four times as much so get it quick before these guys realize it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a great jacket
customer_reviews.text: Loved the lace up sides on this jacket. It arrived in a flat box. The jacket was pretty much laid out flat-not folded at all. The leather was very thick and a bit rigid. I think the leather could be softer and still be just as thick. Probably needs some conditioner. Ok, lots of conditioner. Not bad for the price. Sizing was pretty much on par with American sizing. I got the large which fit perfectly on my chest and shoulders. 46 inch chest here. If you’ve got some paunch, I would opt for a size bigger. The leather is not too forgiving. But it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: user 313

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectations for this jacket, but when it arrived it was ridiculously tight, even though I followed the size chart. I returned it instead of exchanging for a larger size because the arms were even disproportionately tighter, and way too long, even though I have normal size arms for a man of 6’ at 180 pounds. I figured a larger size would have even longer arms, so I just took the return and chalked it up to the hazards of buying clothes on the Internet.
customer_reviews.author: William M.

customer_reviews.title: Size is unbelievably small!
customer_reviews.text: I like the jacket but I know my size and this is laughably small. I am a big and tall guy. Normally a 3X fits just fine but I ordered a 4X just to be safe. I tried it on and it wont even come close to closing in front. The size is closer to a 2X or XL jacket. I tried on a 3X of another brand locally and it fits perfectly but I didn't like the price. Now the local price seems reasonable given that I get something that fits!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Decent Quality but Not Great for All Body Types (52/45/55, ordered a 4X)
customer_reviews.text: My measurements are 52/45/55, and I ordered a 4X. It was too big in the shoulders and too small in the waist, the front looked super weird on me, and in order to return it I have to pay $5+ and find somewhere to print the return label. 🙄 It looks fine, decent material, but I wouldn't recommend this to anyone with shape, definitely not the fit I was going for, and even without the liner it was insanely hot and heavy, so I would recommend this only if it's cold enough where you are. Bummed I have to deal with returning it and losing $5+ in the process.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Lemley

customer_reviews.title: Leathersex.
customer_reviews.text: I'be been wearing black leather biker jackets since 1990, and the time had come to pick up a new one, and I am INCREDIBLY PLEASED with this one! It is beautiful!! REALLY NICE QUALITY. It's heavy, lovely, thick leather, heavy duty stitches, great zippers, and fits perfectly! I am 6 ft, and 182 lbs, and the Large fits me awesome. Oh! And the zip-out liner is really nice as well, and makes a WARM jacket, even warmer! Perfect for if/when winter ever comes... Superb! Like many others have said, this is THE DEAL. You only need THIS leather. Absolutely perfect and a STEAL at this price!!!!! I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Third Star

customer_reviews.title: If you are going to ride, ride with this jacket.
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is warm and comfortable and I wear it even when I am not riding. I bought a 5X to allow enough room underneath for a hoodie if I need it for cold weather riding. It has a classy look to it, and I've gotten a lot of compliments on the jacket. The cords on the side are a little long, so they can be trimmed down if needed. I have laid my bike down once while wearing this jacket and I walked away unscathed. The jacket didn't even show any wear-marks from the incident. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jay M. Hurd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I read multiple reviews on this site. Several of them have noted flaws in the leather. My jacket has non of the defects noted. All the zippers work well. They were stiff at first but loosened up quickly. The linger did catch of my watch at first. It loosened up and with a bit of a twist of the wrist it is easy now to put may wrist from the jacket with the liner in place. I considered removing it at first. It was just cold here and wanted to to leave it in the jacket. The jacket is warm and cuts the wind well. I love the jacket and have purchased one for my wife as well
customer_reviews.author: Shadoblu

customer_reviews.title: Quality jacket without paying hundreds
customer_reviews.text: This jacket was impressive. I bought it for like 120 but its comparable to $400 leather jackets. Its heavy and warm but the insulation is removable. I like the police style look of it as well. The material feels good and is pretty flexible. The only negative thing is that the fit is a bit on the tight side. I ordered a medium tall and it was a bit long on the torso but tight on the arms so i got a regular medium. I've been wearing it for a few weeks and it's holding up well. I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Joubes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Jacket, but not true to size.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this jacket is excellent. Good quality leather, zippers, snaps, etc. The problem is the sizing. I typically wear an XL or XXL jacket. I bought this coat in 2XL and it is very snug in the chest and shoulder area and the sleeves are barely long enough, especially with your arms out in a riding position. Unfortunately, I will have to return the jacket, If this helps, I am 6'1", 230 lbs, with a 46 inch chest.
customer_reviews.author: pm12345

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Jacket
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loves this jacket. He's been wanting a leather jacket like he had when he was younger (re-living his youth maybe) and we've searched all over for one that wouldn't break the bank. So glad we found this one. It fits him perfectly (he went up a size from his usual). It's got a zip out liner so it's very warm. Tons of pockets both inside and outside. This made one aging man feel young and cool again!!
customer_reviews.author: Judabark

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Nice heavy weight, it has a zip out lining. but I haven't bothered to remove it yet. I don't know how others have experienced it, but I would suggest maybe for going up a size. I normally buy a large, and bought an XL--I was thinking extra room for over a sweatshirt or whatever--and I'm glad I did, because even though I have plenty of room in the chest and around the waist it's just right in the shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Schumacher

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket fir the money.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice heavy leather jacket with zip out liner, and internal pockets for adding forearm and shoulder pads. Has that Marlon Brando "The Wild One" classic look to it. Nice thick heavy leather shell with YKK zippers and inside breast pocket. Very well constructed all around. As a tip on the larger sizes I am 6'2, 290 and bought a 4X (which is usually too big) and had to return for a 5X just to get one that fit across the shoulders. So if you're a 3X save yourself the hassle and get the 5X. If you're a 5X your are out of luck here.
customer_reviews.author: Manhood 101

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what was advertised
customer_reviews.text: The price of this jacket is scary. I figured the write up in was a complete lie. This jacket is outstanding! The bright shiny finish is not acceptable so watched online videos on how to age or weather a jacket. What I did was throw 2 shovels of stone in my small concrete mixer and hit the button and let it run for probably an hour in total time. Now it looks like a beat up leather jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely jacket
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket, ordered a size up and it fits well. Real leather, smells and feels great. Form fitting and sharp, and surprisingly heavy. Will definitely wear while riding. Has an inner liner which can zip out for winter use. For the price I have never seen a jacket this high quality, and definitely recommend to anyone looking for a great jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the sticker price fool you, this is a good jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised, having a few leather jackets and knowing a bit about them as I have had more than a few others over the years. This one had brilliant reviews so I decided to try it, even though the sticker had me worried. It is a damn fine medium weight leather! Recommended, but READ THE SIZING CLOSELY AND PAY ATTENTION TO IT, when they say get 2" over here and 3" here DO IT! you will be glad you did and the fit will feel tailored!
customer_reviews.author: Motorhead

customer_reviews.title: Not for use on a motorcycle but great value fashion jacket
customer_reviews.text: I read many of the reviews and was surprised that the one thing missing was size recommendations. I have to say this jacket was way to small for a large. I would have assumed it was a medium if it did not have the size stated on the tag. It was very tight around the middle / stomach and ok in the arms and was a little short in length. I got this for motor biking and that was a mistake this is a fashion jacket and not a practical bike jacket
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bowyer

customer_reviews.title: ... 5 star but the waist belt is not very good. I'll replace it with my own wrap around ...
customer_reviews.text: Would be a 5 star but the waist belt is not very good. I'll replace it with my own wrap around belt and add a back belt loop. But I'll tell everyone that for the price this thing is awesome other than that. I would recommend this to anyone on a budget. I liked that it wasn't that shiny patent leather look but still had to throw it down on the garage floor and kick it around a few times. overall good deal.
customer_reviews.author: MoCephus

customer_reviews.title: 🏍😎 Road rash reducer. 😎🏍
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s a great fit for the money. It’s not quite as thick , heavy , and stiff as I’d like but to be fair my first one from the 80’s would have stopped a 22 caliber bullet and I’ve been searching for another like that one ever since. This is a solid rider’s jacket that would certainly protect from road rash and most knife attacks. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando A. Salguero

customer_reviews.title: Solid jacket
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is solid! By that I mean it is ruggedly made for the motorcycle rider. I first got what I thought would be my correct size but had to exchange it for a larger size. (I'd say get one that's one size bigger than you normally wear.) Besides keeping me warm when I'm riding on chilly mornings, I have had a lot of compliments on how it looks. I like it! You will, too!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit. I chose a size bigger from what ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6' and #205, I bought the 2xl and.... perfect fit. I chose a size bigger from what I wear. Glad I did. This is a heavy, true leather jacket. There is two inside pockets. Lace-up sides, and heavy zippers. This is a steal at 138 dollars. No bulls***! This coat is bad ass. Extremely happy! Shipping was standard but quick.
customer_reviews.author: Kwyjibo

customer_reviews.title: For the price this is hands down the best riding jacket you can get
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is hands down the best riding jacket you can get. Quality is high. Fit is perfect. Wieght and thickness is beyond expectation! I have a bit of stitching that came loose on the breast pocket but nothing came apart, so I am not going to worry about it. I bought this jacket to replace my ten year old Wilson's leather jacket and I expect this one to last just as long.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip M. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Looks like some nice leather
customer_reviews.text: Looks like some nice leather. The liner zipper is very, VERY cheap, like CHEAP and gets jammed every couple inches. The size is way off. Much smaller than you think. I wear 3XL shirts, bought the 5XL and the zipper won't even touch. You... have to pay for return shipping. What a crock.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Mathis

customer_reviews.title: The jacket is amazing quality. Images don't do it justice
customer_reviews.text: OK. As I found other reviews on this helpful, I'll give mine. Received it yesterday. Delivery was fast. 3-days, I think. The jacket is amazing quality. Images don't do it justice. Feels substantial. Sizing. This was hard to estimate as there are conflicting reports on reviews. I'm sure that is because body types are different even if same chest size. I'm 46" chest. 6', 195lbs. Athletic, fairly broad shoulders. I took a 2XL. An XL would not have fit. If you have narrow shoulders, perhaps an XL would fit on 46", but if you are not slight, the 2XL may be best. It's a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Norrath

customer_reviews.title: Best jacket I’ve ordered
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this jacket. It came quickly thanks to amazon and it came in a large flat box. No folding. I’m 6’3” 192lbs with broad shoulders. I normally wear XL jackets but after reading the reviews I decided to go 2XL. I’m glad I did bc it fits great. Much heavier than I was expecting which is perfect bc I like to ride in all temps. I can’t wait to get this jacket out on the road but I expect it will be great. Also an unexpected pleasant surprise is the zip out liner, so you don’t have to sweat to death when it’s brisk but not cold.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D

customer_reviews.title: Value = Quality for Price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. It seems to be very well constructed. I purchased this as a replacement for an older mc jacket that no longer fit. It is very warm and comfortable for riding in temps in low 50's. I could probably go colder with the liner in, but haven't yet had the opportunity. I followed sizing recommendations and went up 1 size. Great fit! Would definitely buy again and/or recommend.
customer_reviews.author: micour4926

customer_reviews.title: Top quality jacket
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is top quality and made of a heavy leather. I had a jacket similar to this but outgrew it. I'm hoping this one will last just as long. If there was one gripe I had with this jacket is that the liner is useless to me, it's not going to keep you warm if that's why it's in there. Not enough to take away a star in my opinion. It has heavy duty zippers that should not break on you. I recommend this jacket if it's your style, or you could go to the Harley dealer and spend 3X as much for the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: WaRMaCHiNE

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I'm pretty impressed with this jacket. It's sturdy, has good weight and seems solidly built. All zippers are ykk. I docked one star because, like other reviewers mentioned, there are some light tooling marks. Not a deal breaker as they're not bad and I feel they add a little character. For the price, this is an awesome jacket.
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: For the money its worth it. I ride almost all year round because I have an addiction to motorcycles but the jackets warm with the liner, not to hot without it on 90 degree days and the leather isnt cheap shit. Havnt had to slide in it doing 70 on pavement but I'd trust it as much as a 400$ jacket. Only complaint is jacket is slightly long so it gets pushed up when I sit on my bike. It'll get better when it wears in more, so it's not a big deal but it's the only complaint I got.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Fiorella

customer_reviews.title: !!!WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible value! I'm 6'4" 280 lbs. Tall in the body. I was very hesitant to order a jacket online. The 3x fits me quite snug; but I want/need a tight fit in a cycle jacket (and of course I'm going to loose weight!) Sleeve length is fine (Often a problem for me). Body length is great. A 4x might be a bit better for me; but at this price I'd order another before I returned this one. Fasteners,stitching,snaps,belt are great.
customer_reviews.author: David Wood

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly high quality for the price. The leather is very thick and durable. The construction of the jacket is decent but not as good as more expensive leather jackets. However it is still an incredible deal for the price. As far as sizing goes I used the chart and it fits like a glove. I'm 5'11 and 175lb so I ordered a small for a more fitted look. Always go a bit smaller than you normally wear when it comes to leather as it tends to stretch out. Overall this is by far my favorite jacket. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Nusspickel

customer_reviews.title: High quality, fits great, looks bada$$
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best jacket I've ever bought. It is warm enough to keep winter winds off, but not so warm that you boil in the heat. It is made of good quality leather, and the stitching seems to be of good quality too. The zip-out liner adds some bulk, but not too much. There is a nylon liner underneath the zip-out portion, so it is still comfortable to wear without the liner. I added a bullet zipper pull to the main zipper, as it is difficult to grab with my motorcycle gloves on. Aside from that, the jacket is perfect for what I need. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Michael G. Hosburg

customer_reviews.title: sleeves too short
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality jacket for the money, I bought a size larger than I normally wear thinking that the sleeves would be longer. this wasn't the case. the body of the jacket was larger. I'm 6'4" muscular build , wide shoulders. that means that the body was for someone with a larger waist size. I sent it it back. If you are tall this isn't the jacket for you.
customer_reviews.author: High volume buyer

customer_reviews.title: Good jacket
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this jacket, it's good quality leather and fits great. Only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is because the first night I got it, the liner ripped away from the zipper, and the button inside the sleeve that connects the liner to the jacket ripped out. I mended these two spots myself with a needle and thread, but it should have been made more sturdy to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic, well made quality jacket
customer_reviews.text: I've had a leather from Harley Davidson since 1996. It was well made and very heavy. It also had a removable liner. I didn't think I would find that type of quality unless I paid a fortune. I was wrong. This is a fantastic, well made quality jacket. The best purchase I've made every on Amazon. The zippers are heavy duty. There are inside pockets, one that is especially made for carrying. The features are endless. I took a medium as I am 5'11'' 150lbs and 40-41" chest. A little firm with a sweater on but fine. It will loosen up and in the summer I will of course remove the liner.
customer_reviews.author: Martin A Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is heavy and very well made. I followed the sizing chart and it fits EXACTLY as it should. My only issue is the smell that I am assuming comes from the tanning or dying process and that is why this did not get 5 stars. I've worn the jacket many times already and even let it sit outside on my Lanai for a week while I was in Florida on vacation and there is still a strong odor. Other than that it is a fantastic jacket for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Wow nice
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy leather and for what it costs I was surprised what amazing quality it is. Zip out liner and I am a big guy and wear 3xl shirts so got 3xl jacket and I could go 2xl if I wanted a anugger fit but I like it and will see how it relaxes. Shoulders are a bit big so I might see about getting them taken in around here but just for $129 I thought it would have been cheap pleather but it is way better
customer_reviews.author: George Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Love my Milwaukee Leather jacket.
customer_reviews.text: I love tbis jacket. Jacket exceeded my expectations. The zip out liner works perfect. My 1st ride with it on was a windy 46 degree day and my upper body was quite warm. Good quality. Well with the price. Note of caution ; pay attention to all the warnings about size. I went extra large and had to exchange it for a XXL. My old jacket was a large.
customer_reviews.author: Tomaless

customer_reviews.title: Not a cool biker jacket. Michael Jackson meets S&M.
customer_reviews.text: They've taken a perfectly good biker jacket and added weird features like tied sides (s&m looking.). Wear this to bike week and have people laugh at you. Very stiff in the shoulder area as well -- like your wearing shoulder pads. PU leather seems ok -- acceptable for the price. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Chrobrego

customer_reviews.title: Really nice jacket for the money, exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend that recently bought a motorcycle, it's well made, thick leather, the zippers are heavy duty, plus it has a removable full jacket liner, for the price, you'd think it cost double what I paid. He loves it and shows it off to his friends, they can't believe how nice it is for the money.
customer_reviews.author: sandy7898

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket!
customer_reviews.text: As many other reviewers have stated, order a size larger than what you normally wear. After reviewing the sizing chart, I ordered an XL only to find that it was too small when it arrived. Fortunately, I was able to return it without issue and re-order an XXL and that one now fits perfectly! This is a great quality jacket and the liner is very warm as well. I definitely recommend this jacket! This is a high quality jacket and well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: C. Allanach

customer_reviews.title: Even though I returned it this is an incredibly nice jacket
customer_reviews.text: I rarely leave reviews for items that I return but this is jacket is an exception. The reason I'm doing this is that similar jackets are extremely overpriced and of inferior quality. This is an incredibly well-made jacket with a great price point, it even has a removable liner. The only reason that I returned it was that I was not a fan of the epaulets on the shoulders and the lacing on the sides. If it were slightly more minimal in design it would be a jacket that I'd probably get decades of use from. I rated comfort, value, and craftsmanship 5/5 but give it a 4/5 because of my issues with the overall look.
customer_reviews.author: Xyrah H.

customer_reviews.title: but doesn't wear too comfortably when riding
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 5 except one detail. It's a motorcycle jacket, but doesn't wear too comfortably when riding. Sleeves are fine in length when just hanging out, stretch your arms you grab your grips and they slide hallway up your forearm. The back rides up quite a bit also. With that being said, it is still a great jacket! Nice heavy, good quality leather. And the price!? You can't beat the deal you get with this jacket for such high quality! I'm considering purchasing another one a size bigger just for riding.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Teves

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is a great value for the price! Very well made, supple leather, plenty of storage with both inside & outside pockets. Love the laces on the sides to ensure a proper fit. Completely removable zip out liner. Sized correctly, use the chart when ordering. I'm 5'9 240 lbs and wear a 38 or 40 waist, I ordered the 2xl and it fits me perfectly. The side laces are great if ur weight fluctuates like mine, just loosen or tighten the side laces to size. For the money of this jacket you will be surprised at the high quality of leather and craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: katherine barker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jacket and a no brainer for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried about choosing the right size so maybe this will help people looking at reviews. I’m 6’1” and weigh about 260 with extra weight in the middle. I ordered a 4x and the fit was almost perfect .... sleeves a tad bit shorter than I like but I’m gonna keep it. It’s very well made and great lookin jacket ..... really you can’t go wrong for the price. I love it .
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cambron

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking heavy motorcycle leather jacket
customer_reviews.text: Very nice leather jacket. I feel it would definitely protect against road rash. The smell from the leather is a little unpleasant at first but once it’s used for a couple rides the smell goes away and it smells like leather. The only thing I didn’t like was that one of the attachments in the sleeve of the jacket where the liner connects broke within the first few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Madlife

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: 6'5, 175lb the large fits fine. long enough in the back and arms, adjustable tightness with belt and side threads allows for a comfortable fit. It does say Milwaukee leather instead of leather king, but it seems like an excellent value so far. If I had to find something to complain about it would be the relatively light weight construction of the belt. It isn't terrible, but I see that being the first weak point. On a side note, people who give a product 1 star because they ordered the wrong size are doing the review system a disservice. You shouldn't bash an otherwise excellent product just because you don't know how to buy clothes for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is great. The time it took to ship was shorter than expected and it came in perfect quality. The jacket feels nice and looks great. Don’t size up like people are saying. I bought a size xl like my shirt size and it isn’t too tight like people said. If anything, it feels a bit loose. All in all, great jacket that I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Pure Ace23

customer_reviews.title: The real deal at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Milwaukee leather coat a few months ago I was blown away by the quality and craftsmanship. So I tried this jacket. Same great quality at a great price. My first purchase was a large and it fit absolutely perfect! So I ordered this in a large but it seemed to big on the shoulder so I returned it for a med. it fit perfectly! I’ll tell you I’ve yet to see better quality in any leather jackets. I will continue to buy Milwaukee products as they’ve proved to be the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Chris1074

customer_reviews.title: Great leather motorcycle jacket.
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'10, 160 pounds and opted for the size large. Jacket fits great, not too loose and is warm and comfortable even with the liner out. There are no obvious defects that I can see. It does not have a peculiar odor as others have mentioned. The leather is supple and well made and really no difference than motorcycle jackets I have bought from Harley stores for up to to $500. A great jacket for the price!
customer_reviews.author: jacog17

customer_reviews.title: This thing is heavy and has that great real leather smell you can feel the nice quality ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow I’m pleasantly surprised at the quality of jacket for the price. This thing is heavy and has that great real leather smell you can feel the nice quality leather grain in it but yet it’s very soft and has that broken in feel. I’m 5’10 and about 250lbs. I went with the 3X and it fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: MotoDan

customer_reviews.title: B.A.M.F. Jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'3" 130lbs. and the size small fits great, easily the best jacket I have ever owned. inside right pocket fits a 7" tablet and the inner left is the perfect size for a pistol/phone/e-cig & accessories, and the jacket overall feels pretty heavy-duty. nice airflow while riding and includes mesh pockets in sleeves and in the back for Kevlar pads (pads not included) and a cold weather zip-out liner (included) but the jacket itself seems to keep one's self fairly warm on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Nice Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy jacket. Even tho it's not made in the US, quality seems good so far. The sizing runs true, for me anyway. The lacing on the side give added adjustment. Sleeves could be longer, but I seem to have that issue with everything. (Long arms I guess.)
customer_reviews.author: wilma

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket
customer_reviews.text: Good heavy duty leather jacket. They recommend going one size larger, if you are pushing the limit on your regular size go up two sizes. I wear XL but was close to XXL so the XXL was very snug, fortunately I'm losing weight so it wasn't a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Shore

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't believe the quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a jacket that looks and feels much more expensive than it is. The quality of the leather is amazing. Thick and very well finished cowhide. The hardware is good quality. I inspected the stitching throughout and found it to be impeccable. It comes with a removable liner which was a nice feature and the pockets are nice and accessible. If you are overweight or have large muscle mass you may be better served going up one size but for most "normal" built folk (I'm 6'1" and 203lbs and usually wear XL jackets, for example) sizing is just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mvdl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality/sizing problems
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this coat. Unfortunately, I had to send mine back. I am 6'4', 260, and I have freakishly long arms. Maybe 38.5. So I usually size up and pray for the best because I cannot stand high water sleeves. I bought the 3x- but the sleeves were at least 1.5 inches too short. Torso was a little short too- cut at the belt line. I'd buy this if they made a tall version. Wife loves hers.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Badass jacket.
customer_reviews.text: Awsome ,nice soft heavy leather. Iam 5.11,170 pounds with wide shoulders . I got the extra large and it is a good fit with room enough for a hoodie underneath. This jacket is super nice for the money. Worth every penny. Looks bad asss!!!. Get it ,you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: 3 starts per my experience. Great jacket though!
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered a medium and happen to be too small and returned it for a large but the jacket i received looked like it was tailored and worn (ordered it new).. Contacted the seller and they assured it would get replaced for a brand new one from the manufacturer, which i did.. sucks i had to wait more than 30 days to get it.. Regardless of all that, it's a great quality jacket and use it to ride when it's chilly out.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, great shipper, great fitment.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy leather jacket, excellent for riding the bike. Great quality, removable liner for easy cleaning. Did have some discoloration on outer leather when opened package, cleaned with conditioner and white powdery discoloration has not returned.
customer_reviews.author: Barnabyj2010

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: I got my jacket delivered today. Fit is great. Usually wear a 3X so I ordered a 5X. Fits great. Sleeves are a touch short but I have gorilla arms so that was expected. Only short when arms extended straight out. Heavy jacket. The only reason I gave 4 stars is because I unzipped the outside right pocket and there is a hole in the lining of the pocket. It is about the size of an aspirin. Not sure what that is about. Other than that it is a great jacket. I have purchased Milwaukie garments in the past and have not had any complaints. Great value for a great jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Maddox

customer_reviews.title: Size All Wrong
customer_reviews.text: This was decent in manufacturing but the sizing must be based on a country where people are much smaller. This XXX-Large coat was more like a Large.
customer_reviews.author: A Allord

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations for the money
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’11” 225 lbs with broad shoulders and thick neck. XL was a very nice fit. This jacket is a little tight in the lower sleeves, but very well made. Not going to get a better jacket for the money. Zip out liner is very nice and the material seems like it will last me many riding seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Heavy Equipment Tech 11

customer_reviews.title: I recommend buying two sizes larger than your normal shirt size
customer_reviews.text: I was dubious about buying this jacket. Being 6'3" and weighing roughly 300 lb, I normally wear a 3XL in shirts. If you are a man of portly stature and fairly tall, I recommend buying two sizes larger than your normal shirt size. It fits me very well and now I look like a fat Max Rocketansky. The one drawback I have noticed with this jacket is that I can't seem to stop singing songs from "Grease" for some reason. 5/5 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: David Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Never got a refund. After returning jacket.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket back in April, while running through some transactions, I noticed that they never refunded me, EVEN AFTER RETURNING/SHIPPING the jacket back to them. Seems as though they try to their best to never give out refunds as I’ve had longing email conversations with their support, they told me that they would refund me once the jacket is returned, so I shipped it back to them with the label they provided. The jacket is good quality, I just had some measurement problems which is why I sent it back. The real issue is I’m at a lost of around 130$ with no jacket either. 😡
customer_reviews.author: joshua ortanez

customer_reviews.title: looks great, feels great
customer_reviews.text: Very good craftsmanship went into making this jacket. X-large fit my 5 11 average frame good. just snug enough with the liner in to feel secure. real leather looks and feel great while cruising at 60 mph speeds on my motorcycle. Great jacket!!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Works great with my black Road King
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Thick and big and long enough for layering under with liner out. Got a 3x and I'm 6'2" 250 with a fair beer gut. Quality leather work. Works great with my black Road King. Comfortable with a t-shirt at 50 to 70 degrees on the interstate.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Willie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Jacket
customer_reviews.text: My wife ordered this for me and received it today. After reading a lot of the reviews we examined the jacket's workmanship attention to detail,it passed with flying colors, and actually exceeded our expectations. We are very well pleased and satisfied. I ordered the large it fits everywhere including sleeve length and the waist comes below my belt. I am 5'10", 190 lbs with broad shoulders. The lacing will help cinch the waist to my comfort and style. I think the weight of the jacket is greater than the 5 lbs it description says. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Donna H. Allred

customer_reviews.title: Classic leather jacket
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is wow. This is a fantastic looking jacket. I got this for myself, so ordered a mens small and it fits perfect. I have wide shoulders, so mens jackets always fit me the best. Inside liner that zips out is way more than I expected. Usual 2 inside smoke pockets wirh a button closure.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful well made jacket Authentic
customer_reviews.text: This jacket was absolutely gorgeous it was heavy and authentic motorcycle jacket that could be worn doing riding my husband's harley We could not believe the quality of this jacket for the price shopping around at the boutiques this jacket was for 450 and up
customer_reviews.author: joseph

customer_reviews.title: HOW DOES THIS NOT COST MORE??
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is WELL worth the money! I love it! FOR SIZING: I am 5'8 and 165 lbs. I ordered an XS and it fits perfectly! It is a little tight on the inside elbow when I bend my arm, but I like the slim look anyhow. If I would have gotten a small the arms would have been a tad too long
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: and its comfortably snug fit
customer_reviews.text: I'm 155lbs and 6'1". Some might describe me as "lanky". I got a small, and its comfortably snug fit. I can still fit a hoody underneath it even with the liner still in. The arms are a little tight, but i don't want a bunch of wind running up there, so that's fine with me. If you're muscular, you might want to go a size up. I'm not...
customer_reviews.author: J B.Top Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Choose the size carefully as I went a little  larger and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: The jacket came in right on time. I ordered on Thursday and was delivered on Saturday am. Very happy with the jacket quality and thickness of the leather. I am 6 foot an 190 pounds and ordered an extra- large. The jacket fits perfectly. The arm length is right on and I can wear a hoodie under it with no problem. I would recommend this jacket for any biker who wants a Brando look. My partner saw it on me and is thinking of ordering one for himself even though he has a Harley Davidson jacket already. The price and quality is excellent and I am a very happy biker!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, the real deal
customer_reviews.text: Read many reviews and got a 3xl. Perfect fit! I’m 6’2” 245lb depending on the cut I’m usually between xl and 2xl. Based on previous reviewers experience I went with 3xl and it fits like I was measured for it. This is a real deal biker jacket, heavy leather, removable liner. Seems well made. The price is off the chart amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Piscator

customer_reviews.title: Husband is 6'4' and 330lbs this jacket was very well ...
customer_reviews.text: Husband is 6'4' and 330lbs this jacket was very well made, fast shipping and well packaged to keep the integrity of jacket intact. I ordered a 4XL - he normally wears a 2XL in shirts and 40 waist. THE FIT...the shoulders were too narrow, the length was too short and the waist was too big. The waist is laced and belted so that can be adjusted but the length of the coat cannot.
customer_reviews.author: sparkalish

customer_reviews.title: Best Jacket Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely awesome jacket! I've always wanted a traditional motorcycle jacket, and I'm so glad that I went with this one. It's very heavy, extremely well made, and simply amazing! Sizing was perfect. Hard to go wrong with this Milwaukee Leather jacket! Buy it... now, before it costs $200-300!
customer_reviews.author: ProfessorD

customer_reviews.title: Only one little problem
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I didn't really like is that the liner seems to start coming off by itself and you have to zip it again after some time, which is kind of annoying and not very easy to do. Also it seems a bit frail (the liner's zipper that is)... Other than that, amazing jacket. Amazing color, feels nice, fits well. I feel like this jacket is worth 5x more than its actual price.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe Augusto

customer_reviews.title: Quality leather jacket
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'8" tall and 150lb. I ordered a small and it fits perfect. Beautifully packaged. After reading the reviews I made sure to check it over real well for popped seams or loose buttons, but everything is perfect. One thing I didn't expect was just how soft a thick leather like this could feel. This seems to be a very sturdy build and very high quality leather. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the money, runs small
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality for the money. RUNS SMALL! I got a 3x I am 6'5 230 lbs with a 52" chest, slightly snug. This is the only garment I have this size. It is a riding jacket. Quite heavy but well suited for the task. Leather shell is ok quality, Pakistan made but does not smell funny at all. Zip out lining, lots of good quality zippers
customer_reviews.author: T. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Once I grow out of it I WILL buy another.
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was super fast and the quality is great. I was planimg on using this for a costume and then returning it but I will most definitely keep it. Pros: Real leather Ties on the side for great fit Your able to remove the inner lining during hot days Alot of pockets Smells good Cons: Shoulders are very broad Most likely because I'm not a big person. That's about it I would definitely buy this jacket again and would recommend to all. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Corbin

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket for price
customer_reviews.text: got to wear on bike rides on cooler days got extra large I'm 5ft8 175pounds fits great the sleeves are little long when arms are down to side but when arms are out riding motorcycle their just right
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Rock n roll, and motorcycles
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Ive had more expensive leathers that weren’t this good. When it’s cold. Zip in he lining on the motorcycle, when it’s warm, take it out. It’s perfect. Plus I got hit on my bike, and this SAVED MY SKIN ON MY ARM! Best part, didn’t even screw up the leather. I’d buy em in every color if I could.. also I play in a rock n roll band. And the chicks dig it
customer_reviews.author: Paulie

customer_reviews.title: What you see in the pic is what you get. Great jacket!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is awesome! I am a size large in all shirts and jackets and that is what I bought, fits perfectly. I am 5 foot 9, 180 lb's. The leather is thick and heavy, it has a removable liner for warmer weather. It has side cinches if you need to tighten it up. Best of all, no wacky chemical smell! Real leather. I have bought 4 other leather jackets from different Company's and returned them for various reasons, Milwaukee Leather is the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: New favorite coat
customer_reviews.text: This is easily the most durable leather coat I have ever purchased at any price. It will last me until the day I die, and then some. CAUTION: Runs small. I'm 6'1" and 245lbs and on a whim I went big with a 3XL instead of 2XL... perfect fit. Ignore the arm length measurements and concentrate on the chest size.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Summerlin

customer_reviews.title: Very good. Ordered 4x size for a size 52 Long ...
customer_reviews.text: Jacket fit and quality was as expected .... Very good. Ordered 4x size for a size 52 Long typical sports jacket size. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Eric W

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket. Go ahead and get it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great jacket. I’m very pleased. Read a lot of reviews before I ordered it. I was a little skeptical because the price was so reasonable. Don’t let that worry you. As far as sizing I’m 5’ 10” and around 175 pounds and a large fits me perfectly. There was a slight chemical type smell as others have mentioned, maybe from the tanning process and what not but after it’s out of the packaging and in the air it goes away. Love the styling too, exactly what I was looking for but couldn’t find for less than $350.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: This is a great jacket for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great jacket for the money. I ordered one size larger than normal and it fits great. 5'11" and 210 lbs., went with XXL. After wearing it a few times the leather is softening up nicely. Heavy, rugged, and seems like it is very high quality. The zip out liner has come in handy on a couple of rides. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Carpro57

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent jacket for the price. I've worn it while riding and while walking a very cold parade. The jacket with the liner is very warm. Lot's of pockets, tho the front one is too small to hold anything. Like the others are saying, the sizes run small. I'm 5'6", 200 lbs, 40 " chest, 36" waist. The large fits me well, if slightly snug, especially around the belly (but that's my fault, not the jacket's). It's a good quality jacket. I recommend it highly
customer_reviews.author: T. S. OReilly

customer_reviews.title: You wont find a better deal on such a great jacket
customer_reviews.text: I am still floored at how high quality this jacket is for the price. HEAVY jacket made from REAL leather. Fits like a charm and has a great look to it. Would buy this jacket a 100x over again.
customer_reviews.author: vincent proctor

customer_reviews.title: it's a nice jacket and a good buy
customer_reviews.text: This manufacturer designs its jackets at least one size too small. I do believe that it was sized before adding the removable lining. Be wary of this; otherwise, it's a nice jacket and a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: joseph a lucarelli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Jacket for the price. Nice heavy leather- Exceeded expectations~ LOVE that this jacket has a zip-out-liner.
customer_reviews.author: Guitar Tech

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect in my shoulders and arm length
customer_reviews.text: I weigh 180 and am 5ft 7. 34 inch waist belly little bigger. Fits perfect in my shoulders and arm length. snug not tight around belly. awesome jacket keeps me warm 40 degree temps at 90 miles and hour for 30 mile trip. love the jacket sleeve zip up snug around wrists just awesome i love it
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: Could not ask for a better price or quality
customer_reviews.text: Got my jacket today and was not disappointed by the quality and feel of the leather as it was soft and comfortable, not all stiff and hard to move in as opposed to some other leather jackets. I was also highly pleased with the zip-out liner as I plan to make good use of this jacket through both the winter and summer months. So yeah, have to say that for what I paid, this jacket came not only quickly but is of such great quality that I would definitely buy from this company again should I be in the market for more leather or riding accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A jacket that will last a lifetime
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. A nice thich heavy leather. I’ve owned 3 in my 53 year and I’m sure this one will make it to the end. Great leather. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tattoo-Mike

customer_reviews.title: Buy this jacket
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific leather jacket. I'm 5'11 , 170 lbs size 40 sport coat and I ordered size Large. The fit is perfect, not too tight but snug on my body. I hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon buyer

product_meta.title: Milwaukee Leather SH1011 Men's Classic Side Lace Police Style Motorcycle Leather Jacket - X-Small
product_meta.description: Size:X-SmallMen's Classic Side Lace Police Style Motorcycle Jacket. Two lower zippered pockets with the extra ticket book snap close storage pocket. Classic built-in waist belt/buckle
feature_bullets: Made Made of Premium Milled Cowhide 1.2-1.3mm Thick with Full Sleeve Zip Out Thermal Liner
Side Lace Detailing for Optimal Fit with Half Belt for Easy Adjustment
Two Lower Zippered Pockets with the Extra Ticket Book
